name: CITALAnalyzerRuleset
description: Name of Variables must not contain a prefex except it is necessary for avoiding conflicts.

rules.justification: Do not use an Object ID for properties or variable declarations.
DataClassification is explicitly set to 'CustomerContent', the default value and therefore unnecessary.
The name of the event subscriber must match the name of the event it subscribes to.

An event subscriber should only receive the parameters it actually needs. In case of subscribing to a specific element, add the name of the element before the eventname and seperate them by using '_'.
Variables must contain the name of the AL object but no speical characters or whitespaces
EventSubscribers must always be placed in a Codeunit that has the same name as the object to which the event belongs.
It is not allowed to use 'addbefore', 'addafter', 'movebefore' or 'moveafter' in Page Extensions.
Call by reference may only be used if the variable is modified within the procedure.
